GSD.product_version: versions from v5.6 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
KVM: Don't set Accessed/Dirty bits for ZERO_PAGE

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 26cdeedbb616227d926a98e7232930f85f7123ca, it was introduced in version v5.6 by commit 7df003c85218b5f5b10a7f6418208f31e813f38f. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: KVM: Don't set Accessed/Dirty bits for ZERO_PAGE
